name: Ensure RDS Instances accept traffic only from the Application Servers
body: In AWS, security groups can filter the traffic based on the security group of the source. Ideally, the security groups you use for your RDS instances only allow traffic originating from the application layer, which in most cases can be identified by certain security groups.
remediationDescription: Consult the steps described in the *Security group scenario* of https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/Overview.RDSSecurityGroups.html.
